name: TetralogyOfFallotDisordersSNOMED
title: Tetralogy of Fallot (Disorders) (SNOMED)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has Tetralogy of Fallot regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record),(Inclusion Criteria: Pentalogy of Fallot; Tetralogy of Fallot with an associated inter-atrial communication, either a patent foramen ovale (PFO) or an atrial septal defect (ASD); Tetralogy of Fallot; Pulmonary atresia with VSD),(Exclusion Criteria: Simultaneous occurrence of a VSD and pulmonary stenosis that has TOF physiology but has not been diagnosed as Tetralogy of Fallot; Trilogy of Fallot)
